title: Strip mining methods include mountaintop removal

content.question: Which of the following best describes the process known as “mountaintop removal”?

choices.label: The use of trees planted at high elevations to eliminate carbon dioxide from the atmosphere
The use of heavy equipment to move overburden downhill during the strip mining of coal
The placement of hazardous-waste disposal sites at high elevations in mountainous regions
The shearing away of undersea mountain peaks to improve shipping lanes
The reduction of glacial ice resulting from increased global temperatures

content.answer: The use of heavy equipment to move overburden downhill during the strip mining of coal
